known_issues: Create server button does not work (server creation fails when user presses 'Create Server').

existing_features.title: Ensure the frontend Create Server dialog provides a clear error when server creation fails and does not silently do nothing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement server creation and listing in the Motoko backend so the frontend "Create Server" flow works end-to-end.

Add/align any additional backend server endpoints that the existing UI immediately depends on after server creation (server ordering and basic membership), to prevent follow-on failures after a successful create.
